txt.en: 'The people of this poor town would be grateful for whatever help you could lend us.'
'Where were the Rangers when the Orcs attacked? They've as much as abandoned us!'
'It will not be an easy task, but mark my words, Trestlebridge will not fall to these Orcs!'
'If you seek to help us, speak to Captain Trotter of the guard.'
'If only you had arrived a few days ago. The Orcs nearly overran us, thanks to one guard falling asleep during his watch.'
